game.title: The Lost Amulet
game.objective: Find the lost amulet of the ancient king.
game.description: The amulet was stolen from the king's tomb by a group of bandits. It is said to be hidden in a cave deep in the forest.
game.reward: The amulet, which is worth a fortune.

task.description: The bandits may know where the amulet is hidden.
task.location: The bandit camp in the forest.

task.description: The cave is hidden deep in the forest. It is said to be guarded by a dragon.
The dragon is a powerful creature. It will be a tough fight.
The amulet is hidden in a chest in the cave.

task.objective: Return the amulet to the king.
task.description: The king will be grateful for your help.
